content.c_experience:
* Minimum of 5\-7 years of relevant experience
* Experience with partner services management
* Proficient with MS Word, Excel and Power Point
content.c_responsibilities:
* Create and present customized presentations and sales, upsell, and/or renewal materials based on specific partner goals and objectives
* Independently manage day\-to\-day partner activation process including activation planning, promotional development, media planning, advertising creation and approval, hospitality, event coordination and recapping
* Support in renewal efforts for WNBA partnerships and multi\-league partnerships that include the WNBA where needed
* Support MP\&M WNBA Lead in liaising between GP\&M, WNBA, Finance, Communications, and other departments that work closely on partner marketing \& media partnership matters
* Lead necessary information gathering and communications in areas such as up\-to\-date partnership lists and sponsored programs and platforms, WNBA marketing partner financials, benefit commitments, etc.
* Collaborate with full sales and account teams on WNBA\-specific deals
* Manage budgets and expenses for marketing partners, including fluency in financial reporting
* Identify and pursue additional revenue/upsell opportunities
* Prepare creative review submissions and become fluent in WNBA IP guidelines and processes
* Develop strong relationships with internal constituents and external partners and agencies
* Provide partnership expertise in the comprehension of contractual elements, understanding of both WNBA's and partners' business goals/target audiences/marketing strategy and knowledge of best practices and industry news
* Proactively seek input from across organization to develop integrated and successful sponsorship activation ideas for potential and existing partners
* Manage execution of WNBA properties and programs, with a focus on partner activation:
* Day\-to\-day contact with all NBA internal departments on properties
* Serve as key liaison with events
* Work closely with account teams on partner objectives and their alignment with program objectives
* Oversee development and production of creative elements and traffic approvals for program materials
* Compile and provide internal updates on program development and execution
* Keep records and recommendations for internal and external purposes
* Communicate key issues internally via status reports and meeting updates
* Manage budgets
* Drive revenue growth through the creation of new sellable marketing programs, identification of sales targets and development of sales strategies
* Overall inventory management
content.c_skills:
* Ability to develop and write thoughtful, customized corporate presentations, partnership proposals, and email communications
* Ability to communicate effectively with key internal \& external stakeholders
* Understanding of marketing and branding to develop partner activation ideas that achieve both league and partner objectives
* Knowledge and desire to work in an events/activation capacity for designated events
* Strong understanding of all facets of sponsorship activation including events, media, marketing rights, content, etc.
* Ability to multi\-task
* Strong organizational skills
* Strong attention to detail
* Process\-oriented
* Interest in building a positive culture
* Must be highly motivated, proactive, self\-starter with high energy and team spirit
content.description:
This position will be responsible for managing multi-year corporate partnerships for the WNBA and supporting the MP&M Activation team on assigned WNBA events and programs. The role will manage all aspects of the partner management process from on-boarding, relationship building and management, benefit fulfillment, recapping, upsells, and renewals, while also managing partner benefit fulfillment for WNBA events such as Tip-Off, All-Star Voting & All-Star, Commissionerâ€™s Cup, Playoffs/Finals.

The person in this role will serve as a subject matter expert on the WNBA, WNBA Marketing Partners, and how best to maximize partner activation across all WNBA Marketing Partners. There will be a focus on working across the organization to ensure input from key constituents while helping drive the creation, implementation, strategic management and profitability of partner promotional programs and initiatives.
content.name: WNBA Global Partnerships & Activation
